data.text: Create a Python class named `Artifact` to represent a cultural artifact in a museum. This class should have attributes `name` and `origin`. Define an `__init__` method to initialize these attributes. Create a method `describe()` that prints a statement describing the artifact's name and origin. Instantiate an object of this class with the name 'Rosetta Stone' and origin 'Egypt', then call the `describe()` method.
